page.title: 20A DAY IN AN ADULT LIFE
page.content: We wake up at 7-o-cclock. The children go to Sunday school in the morning. I cook Sunday Roast when they get back. If the weather is nice we take them out for the afternoon, either to the beach, playing field or like this Sunday we went to Newquay Leisure park. The children go on the boats, trampolines, bikes and train. Then we have a picnic tea on the grass, and we feed the ducks and the other birds. Then we go home, and we bath and wash our hair, and the children go to bed. If the weather is bad, we usually get a cartoon or family video and stay in to watch them instead.
